00023 /*
00024 #define INIT_ARGLIST wchar_t **CSFTitle, wchar_t **CSFTooltip, char **INIFileName, char **mapfilter, bool AIAllowed, int MPModeIndex
00025 #define INIT_ARGS CSFTitle, CSFTooltip, INIFileName, mapfilter, AIAllowed, MPModeIndex
00026 
00027 #define INIT_FUNC(addr) void (__stdcall * Allocate)(INIT_ARGLIST) = void (__stdcall *)(INIT_ARGLIST)addr;
00028 
00029 #define UNINIT_FUNC(addr) void (__thiscall * Deallocate)(void *x, int flags) = void(__thiscall *)(void *, int)addr;
00030 
00031 
00032 struct Initializer
00033 {
00034         void (__thiscall * Deallocate)(void *x, int flags);
00035         void (__stdcall * Allocate)(INIT_ARGLIST);
00036 };
00037 
00038 #define FACTORY(addr) static Initializer *Init = (Initializer *)addr;
00039 
00040 #define MPMODE_CTOR(clsname, addr) \
00041         clsname( \
00042                 wchar_t **CSFTitle, \
00043                 wchar_t **CSFTooltip, \
00044                 char **INIFileName, \
00045                 char **mapfilter, \
00046                 bool AIAllowed, \
00047                 int MPModeIndex) \
00048                         JMP_THIS(addr);
00049 */
00050 
00051 //BAAAAH THIS FILE IS HELL - rewrite requested :P -pd
00052 #define MPMODE_CTOR(clsname, addr) clsname() {}
